items.label: stroggyli 128 – concept exhibition for aqua gallery

columns.text: STROGGYLI 128 – CONCEPT EXHIBITION FOR AQUA GALLERY

Restart Contemporary Art Platform helds Another interesting project that is designed specially for the Aqua Gallery by Art Hotel Santorini , member of Aqua Vista Hotels.

This exceptional concept exhibition Stroggyli 128, created exclusively for Aqua Gallery with works inspired by Storggyli ( Santorini’s former name ) and the 128 nautical miles separating the island from Piraeus, completes the third cycle of our gallery. 30 artists, 128 nautical miles and 1 island …

This exhibition is  an idea by Dimitris Lazarou who organized the exhibition, bringing together the remarkable works of 30 contemporary artists. He notes: “Stroggyli is the oldest name of Santorini, which is 128 nautical miles from Piraeus. The island’s history is intertwined with its volcano. It is the island of Lava, the island with the only caldera in the world inhabited by the inner part of the volcano. The 30 artists were invited to create works inspired by the special character of the island, each corner of which is an Art. ”

The exhibition “Stroggyli-128” will be presented from Saturday, August 24 until the end of the summer season at Aqua Gallery at Art Hotel Santorini.

Get the most of it by combining  Art with Luxurity. Book your room at Art Hotel Santorini and whilst staying in the House of Art, enjoy breakfast for royalties, diving and soaking in beautiful red pools and Jacuzzis, relaxing by the amazing view of Santorinian Sunsets, signature drinks and cocktails, and 24/7 access to the Aqua Gallery!

Stroll around Art Hotel Santorini

Art Hotel Santorini

items.title: THE CUSTOM OF CIKNOPEMPTI
items.description: The second Thursday of the Triodion, the Creatine. (period of Carnival) is called Ciknopempti ( Cikna = the smell of burning meat and Pempti = Thursday), because on this day all the houses roast meat or melt the fat from the pork and the 'Cikna' is widespread all over the...
items.excerpt: The second Thursday of the Triodion, the Creatine. (period of Carnival) is called Ciknopempti ( Cikna = the smell of burning meat and Pempti = Thursday), because on this day all the houses roast meat or melt the fat from the pork and the 'Cikna' is widespread all over the...
items.seo_title: The custom of Ciknopempti  | Aqua Vista Hotels | Hotel Management Company
items.seo_description: The second Thursday of the Triodion, is called Ciknopempti ( Cikna = the smell of burning meat and Pempti = Thursday), because on this day all over Greece, in all houses, and also at the streets everybody roasts meat or melt the fat from the pork and the 'Cikna' is widespread all over the country!
